"ノーディランの肉の調達":
"Dear <%me>,
I made you go through all that trouble,
but it turns out I got the dates wrong!
It wasn't my friend's birthday! I'm just
the worst... But you know, that stew was
amazing! I'd like to kick it up a notch
y give myself a bit of a challenge.
Imagine that same stew with Nordiran
meat. I've gotta have some, please!
※Cae de Nv.24+ Nordirans."
